education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Computer Engineering and Computer Science

items: Add feature requests for the trading tool, leveraging internal endpoints to simplify updates to client profiles.
Proposed and self-developed new fact sheet generator written in Python using Typst for 2025Q2+. In production.

Self-developed and maintained a new legacy regression testing platform for the Analytics Engine in Golang, yielding an overall 20%+ decrease in runtime in tandem with a new TUI, logging, daily notifications via crontab and Zulip, and QoL features requested by senior developers. Removed dependency on Perl, Python, and R.
Rewrote Perl, Python, and R scripts in Go, yielding upwards of an 18x+ reduction in runtime.
Optimized model backtesting codebase written in R, decreasing runtime by 34%. Added 540 unit tests and fixed legacy test suite.

Fulfilled and expanded on feature requests. Integrated daily metrics, target template, and account tracking for the internal client tracker. Integrated Zulip's API for accessible notifiations upon function calls.

Crafted 14 client-facing slide decks reflecting ROAS, Audience Segmentation, Long-term Impact, and other internal metrics for 11 clients of the Amazon Grocery team using PostgreSQL queries and Python notebooks.
Created 5 1P & 3P insights with 104 views and 19 downloads for the IMDb team. 1P data collected using PostgreSQL queries and Tableau. 3P data collected from GWI and MRI-Simmons.
Maintained internal web application tracking project status built using Python and Streamlit.
Created and documented an internal query analysis web application built using Python, Streamlit, Vega-Altair, and pandas.

projects.name: Resume Builder
items: Designed and implemented a resume builder formatted like Jake's resume without the hassle of LaTeX.

projects.name: Kino
items: Designed and implemented the PostgreSQL database for storing movie and user data
Automated data aggregation and storage of publicly available data using Python.
